content.rendered:
It is important to first of all understand that not all roulette games are the same. Different online casinos offer a number of different roulette versions around the world. Regardless, there are common roulette games whose rules are universal. These are the games whose rules you ought to master.  There exist two common types of roulette games. They consist of the American roulette and the European roulette. What sets these two apart is the fact that the American variation has a double (00) while the European one has only one zero (0).

When playing roulette, the focus is not only on the wheel that you ought to spin but more on the table from which individual bets are placed. It is only after placing the different types of bets on the table that the wheel is spun and a small ball is thrown on the spinning wheel. The number which the slot ball lands on, becomes the winning number. It is important for you to know that the layout of both  the wheel and table are subject to change, depending on the roulette game chosen.

Bet types

If you are new to roulette games, it is often said that experience is the best teacher. The best way to understand a game like roulette is by actually playing it. It is worth mentioning before we delve further into the bet types that in these games, more numbers mean a higher payout. That being mentioned, the bet types here are divided into three different types. The three bet types are inside bets, outside bets and announced bets.

Inside and outside bets are common for all roulette games and therefore, it is important that you grt to understand them well. Announced bets are more advanced bet types and are only found in selected roulette variant games.

Inside bets

In a typical roulette game, when you look at the basic table layout, you will notice that the main part of the table is made up of numbers which start from 0 -36 while the rest are sectors for waging on groups of numbers. The best placed on the numbers are called inside bets while those placed on other sectors are called outside bets.

Outside bets

These bets are those that cover bigger groups of numbers are a further sub-divided into 5 types. Red or black are divisions on the basis of color , odd or even are on the basis of whether the outcome is odd or even while dozens means one ought to bet on either of three dozens on the layout table. The column bet involves choosing which column will win while (1-18) or (19-36) involves choosing whether the winning number will be lower or higher than 19.

Outside bet

In this bet type, numbers 1,5,9,12,14, 16,19,23,27,30, 32 and 34 create the shape of a snake and make it one bet type while numbers 2, 6, 8, 10, 13, 17, 20, 24, 26, 29, 28 and 35 make another snake belt and are considered another bet type (black snake). 17/20 numbers and 26/29 are split bets and the other bets are straight ones.

Announced bets

These are mostly featured in French roulette and also in some online European roulettes.

Are you looking to try your hand on a roulette game today? Here are some of the most popular spin and win online games in Kenya.
